title: Montezuma Castle National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   We've got reptiles galore! Learn more about 'em!               Learn about useful plants, like medicinal...               A matate on the trail?! Check out our virtual...               Teachers! Help your kids learn about living...               Stop by Montezuma Well, too!         Â     Looking to learn more?  Explore below:  History & Culture From the Sinagua who built this cliff dwelling, to the establishment of a celebrated National Monument designated by Theodore Roosevelt, learn about the people and stories that make Montezuma Castle special.   Photos & More Experience the park from afar! Check out photos, virtual tours, and videos.   Nature Montezuma Castle is more than just a Pueblo - the Beaver Creek and Montezuma Well help make this a special landscape.     News Browse press releases, subscribe to updates, and read the park newspaper.
